The main event in this passage is the individual's feelings of self-hatred, dissatisfaction with their life, and desire to die. They express a sense of hopelessness and frustration with their situation, feeling that there is no point in continuing to live in a world that they perceive as unfair and materialistic.
Post: "I'm so tired of feeling like I'm stuck in this rut. No matter how hard I try, I can't seem to escape the feelings of self-hatred and dissatisfaction that have been plaguing me for years. I feel like I'm just going through the motions of life without any real purpose or direction. And worst of all, I can't help but feel like it's all my own fault. They don't get how hard it is to live in a world that's so against me. It's like, I can't even find any solace in death. That's how hopeless I feel. That's how much I feel like there's no way out of this misery. It's like, I just want to disappear, to cease existing altogether.
